meta.description: Karen is a health writer and editor with 30-plus years of  experience. She specializes in consumer health and has a background in health policy and business. Her publishing credits include The Washington Post, U.S. News & World Report, Westchester Magazine, Working Mother, Health.com, Prevention.com, Time Health, and the news syndicate HealthDay.

title: Karen Pallarito | Livestrong.com
